*** Linet Integration ***

2019.02.25 - version 1.0.18
* clear transit cache on item update(faster price update!)

* better multi payment gateway support

* the tails of the forgetn print_r!

* sku find with product_variation support

* since date time fix

* better reverse sync without SKU

* add since
* reverse sync without SKU

2018.7.31 - version 1.0.1
* mutex inv

2018.6.25 - version 1.0.0
* updated tested version
* we can update the photo gallery!

 * eav search over items


2018.5.7 - version 0.986

 * removed wp_filesystem(doesnt support cron..)

2018.1.22 - version 0.985
 * large data support
 * sync only active items


2018.1.22 - version 0.980

 * variant sync attributes

 * language by billing country


2017.10.29 - version 0.972
 * variant sync data


2017.10.26 - version 0.971
 * picture sync!
 * variant aware products!

    disable email
    one line doc
 * manual sync was bad for catagories
 * some minor bug fixes, better compatibly with WooCommerce API


2017.8.21 - version 0.97
